name: Blum Official Token ✅
description: Blum (BLUM) started as a Telegram game called Blum Game or Blum Airdrop. Its initial goal was to distribute Blum tokens to users through various tasks and referrals. However, Blum is evolving into much more than a simple game. It’s transforming into a decentralized exchange (DEX) with advanced features, allowing users to trade a wide range of cryptocurrencies quickly, easily, and securely.
